description: Airing on Monday, December 29, 2014: First up on today's show, Professor Anne-Marie Chang talks about the importance of turning off your tablets before bed. We'll also speak with reporter Richard Macauley about Uber’s new partnership with Chinese Search Engine, Baidu. And New York magazine’s associate editor, Maggie Lange talks about a thief who was identified after her picture was posted on Tinder by the owner of the startup she burglarized.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, December 29, 2014
